entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 12.
